answer:
In BC, the publicly funded (free) HPV program expanded to grade 6 males in September 2017. Males in later grades are not be eligible for the free vaccine unless they are at increased risk of HPV infection, listed here. If your son is not considered at increased risk of HPV infection, the vaccine is recommended but not provided free.  Learn why all vaccines aren't free here. The HPV vaccine can be purchased at most pharmacies and travel clinics. 
Immunization Nurse
